item.Q:
Write the character:
is; are; am; yes; to be
item.A:
shì
就是 jiùshì (emphasizes that something is precisely or exactly what is stated); precisely; exactly; even; if; just like; in the same way as

item.Q:
Write the character:
(negative prefix); not; no
item.A:
bù
不能 bùnéng cannot; must not; should not

item.Q:
Write the character:
to have; there is; there are; to exist; to be
item.A:
yǒu
没有 (沒有) méiyǒu haven't; hasn't; doesn't exist; to not have; to not be

item.Q:
Write the character:
(located) at; (to be) in; to exist; in the middle of doing sth; (indicating an action in progress)
item.A:
zài
现在 (現在) xiànzài now; at present; modern; current; nowadays

rén
人民 rénmín (the) people

traditional: 來
lái
出来 (出來) chūlái to come out; to emerge

yòng
作用 zuòyòng action; activity; actions; acts; effect; to play a role

item.Q:
Write the character:
o'clock; time; when; hour; season; period; surname
item.A:
traditional: 時
shí
同时 (同時) tóngshí at the same time; simultaneously

item.Q:
Write the character:
1: (negative prefix for verbs); have not; not
2: drowned; to end; to die; to inundate
item.A:
traditional: 沒
1: méi 2: mò
没有 (沒有) méiyǒu haven't; hasn't; doesn't exist; to not have; to not be 没收 (沒收) mòshōu confiscate

to be born; to give birth; life; to grow
item.A:
shēng

item.Q:
Write the character: shì
(jiùshì de shì)
item.A:
is; are; am; yes; to be
就是 jiùshì (emphasizes that something is precisely or exactly what is stated); precisely; exactly; even; if; just like; in the same way as

item.Q:
Write the character: bù
(bùnéng de bù)
item.A:
(negative prefix); not; no
不能 bùnéng cannot; must not; should not

item.Q:
Write the character: yǒu
(méiyǒu de yǒu)
item.A:
to have; there is; there are; to exist; to be
没有 (沒有) méiyǒu haven't; hasn't; doesn't exist; to not have; to not be

item.Q:
Write the character: zài
(xiànzài de zài)
item.A:
(located) at; (to be) in; to exist; in the middle of doing sth; (indicating an action in progress)
现在 (現在) xiànzài now; at present; modern; current; nowadays

item.Q:
Write the character: rén
(rénmín de rén)
item.A:
man; person; people
人民 rénmín (the) people

item.Q:
Write the character: lái
(chūlái de lái)
item.A:
traditional: 來
to come
出来 (出來) chūlái to come out; to emerge

item.Q:
Write the character: yòng
(zuòyòng de yòng)
item.A:
to use
作用 zuòyòng action; activity; actions; acts; effect; to play a role

item.Q:
Write the character: shí
(tóngshí de shí)
item.A:
traditional: 時
o'clock; time; when; hour; season; period; surname Shi
同时 (同時) tóngshí at the same time; simultaneously

item.Q:
Write the character: méi
(méiyǒu de méi)
item.A:
traditional: 沒
(negative prefix for verbs); have not; not
没有 (沒有) méiyǒu haven't; hasn't; doesn't exist; to not have; to not be

item.Q:
Write the character: mò
(mòshōu de mò)
item.A:
traditional: 沒
drowned; to end; to die; to inundate
没收 (沒收) mòshōu confiscate

item.Q:
Write the character: shēng
(shēngchǎn de shēng)
item.A:
to be born; to give birth; life; to grow
生产 (生產) shēngchǎn to produce; manufacture

traditional: 天氣
tiānqì weather
jìaqī vacation
dùjìa go on holiday
dǎsuàn to plan; to intend; to calculate; plan; intention; calculation

traditional: 氣溫
qìwēn air temperature
zhōumò weekend
fùjìn (in the) vicinity; nearby; neighboring; next to

traditional: 海邊
hǎibiān seaside

traditional: 曬太陽
shàitàiyáng bask

traditional: 參加
cānjīa to participate; to take part; to join

traditional: 夏令營
xìalìngyíng summer camp

traditional: 準備
zhǔnbèi preparation; prepare
tuōfú TOEFL; Test of English as a Foreign Language

traditional: 考試
kǎoshì exam
zhāodài to receive (guests); to entertain; reception

traditional: 親戚
qīnqi a relative (i.e. family relation)
liáotiān to chat; to gossip

traditional: 烹飪
pēngrèn cooking; culinary arts

traditional: 現成
xiànchéng ready made
shúshí cooked food

traditional: 緊張
jǐnzhāng nervous; keyed up; intense; tense; strained; in short supply; scarce

traditional: 超過
chāoguò to surpass; to exceed; to outstrip
jīabān (v) work overtime
xīnkǔ hard; exhausting; with much toil

traditional: 各種
gèzhǒng every kind of; all kinds of; various kinds

traditional: 辦理
bànlǐ to handle; to transact; to conduct

traditional: 離婚
líhūn to divorce; to be divorced from (one's wife or husband)

traditional: 手續
shǒuxù formalities
hūnyīn matrimony; wedding; marriage

traditional: 發生
fāshēng to happen; to occur; to take place
zhàngfu husband
wàiyù an extramarital affair

traditional: 傷心
shāngxīn grieve

traditional: 難過
nánguò feel sorry; be grieved
lìyòng exploit; make use of; to use; to take advantage of; to utilize
xiǎngshòu to enjoy (rights, benefits etc)
rénshēng life
jīnnián this year
qùnián last year
qiánnián the year before last
míngnián next year

traditional: 後年
hòunián the year after next
chūntiān spring (season)
xìatiān summer
qiūtiān autumn
dōngtiān winter

traditional: 季節
jìjié time; season; period

traditional: 現在
xiànzài now; at present; modern; current; nowadays

traditional: 過去
guòqu (in the) past; former; previous; to go over; to pass by

traditional: 未來
wèilái future; tomorrow; approaching; coming; pending

traditional: 將來
jiānglái (the) future

traditional: 從前
cóngqián previously; formerly
mùqián at the present time; currently
chūnjìa spring break
shǔjìa summer vacation
hánjìa winter vacation
jìaqī vacation
jìarì holiday; non-working day

traditional: 節日
jiérì holiday; festival
tōngcháng regular; usual; ordinary; normal

traditional: 經常
jīngcháng day to day; everyday; daily; frequently; constantly; regularly; often
chángcháng frequently; usually; often
wǎngwǎng often; frequently

traditional: 總是
zǒngshì always

traditional: 有時候
yǒushíhou sometimes
ǒuér betweenwhiles
hěnshǎo seldom
bùzài no more; no longer

traditional: 從來沒
cóngláiméi never

traditional: 已經
yǐjīng already

traditional: 曾經
céngjīng once; already; former; previously; (past tense marker used before verb or clause)
zhèngzài in the process of (doing something or happening); while (doing)

traditional: 現代
xiàndài modern times; modern age; modern era; Hyundai, South Korean company
gǔdài ancient times; olden times

traditional: 當代
dāngdài the present age; the contemporary era

traditional: 時代
shídài age; era; epoch; period
niándài a decade of a century (e.g. the Sixties); age; era; period
zuìjìn recent; recently; soon

traditional: 近來
jìnlái recently; lately
